TopicTitle: Usability: Indicate how to get VAB/SPH Rotation in less-than-5-degree increments?

Articles.Content:
Most engines have 1 or at most 2 degrees of gimbal. But even the fine rotation controls in the SPH / VAB only allow at lesat 5 degrees of rotation.

This makes it difficult to perfectly line up engine thrust with the center of mass. It would be very useful to have 1 degree fine controls available in Part Rotation mode.

The Part Angle Display 0.30 mod promises this, but doesn't seem to work on node-mounted parts.

Any way to do this I'm missing?

Edited December 21, 2014 by antbin
Psst... you can disable angle snap for pixel precision (i.e. you can be as precise as your mouse/screen will let you be) Be sure to use the gizmos though

> you can disable angle snap

I have done this once by accident but have no idea how. Help?
